name: Foxy Adventure
description:
There is a beautiful princess called Princess Lizzie. She lives in a tower, waiting for a message from Joel, more widely known as Foxy Adventure, the cunning fox,  to come. But The King Of Moons will not let him! The King sends monsters to defeat Joel! Let's see if you can beat The King Of Moons!

The game is still in beta and currently there are not many things to do in the game! but, new updates will come every month! (Using Yasmins Translate)
